error.update_image: An error occured while updating an image: %s
error.extracting_editing: An error occured while extracting/editing a facevector: %s

oval.description: Thin frames are not the best choice (make you look wider), basically all frames are good. It is worth paying attention to the frames of square shape, rectangular, aviators. It is better to avoid frames that are too large or too small. Rim and semi-rim frames are a good choice for a long face. Any color suits you.

triangle.description: It is worth paying attention to the cat-eye frames, Clubmasters, round. Thin metal or plastic frames will suit you. It's better to avoid frames with dark shades. Light colors will suit you. Also consider the option of transparent plastic frames.

oblong.description: It is worth paying attention to the round-shaped frames and aviators. For greater harmony, it is recommended to consider frames that are elongated in height rather than in width. Try frames where the color of the temples differs from the main color.

heart.description: You have a pointed chin. For harmony, it is better to choose bottom-heavy frames. Experiment with the retro style. You should pay attention to the oval, clubmaster, aviators frames. It is better to avoid narrowing and very thin models. Light, light colors, shades of brown will suit you.

diamond.description: This face shape is rare and balanced. To emphasize certain features, consider cat-eye frames, clubmasters, and oval frames. It is better to avoid frames that are too large or too small. It is better to avoid bottom-heavy models. Consider the option of metal semi-rim frames. Shades of brown and black will suit you. And try frames with a dark top.

round.description: It is worth paying attention to the cat-eye frames, rectangular, square and angular in generall. It is better to avoid round, oval, not elongated and thick frames. Consider the option of rim and semi-rim models. Suitable shades of brown and black. And try frames with prints.

square.description: It is worth paying attention to the frames of round, oval shape, and smoothed curves. It is better to avoid square and rectangular frames, which attract attention to the jaw. Consider the option of wide plastic frames. Experiment with colors, try bright prints.

rectangle.description: You should pay attention to round frames, aviators, frames with smooth curves. For greater harmony, it is recommended to consider frames that are elongated in height rather than in width. Try frames where the color of temples differs from the main color.

wider.description: Frames that are elongated in width will suit you.

longer.description: Frames that are elongated in height will suit you.

soft.description: Angular frames will be the best choice.

defined.description: Soft curved frames will be the best choice.

beard.description: The beard shifts the emphasis down, it is recommended to consider top-heavy models.

thick.description: Thick fullrim frames will look comical with thick eyebrows.

thin.description: Thick frames will highlight the eye area.

flat.description: The shape of the upper part of the frame should follow the line of the eyebrows.

curly.description: The shape of the upper part of the frame should follow the line of the eyebrows.

roof.description: The shape of the upper part of the frame should follow the line of the eyebrows.

angry.description: The shape of the upper part of the frame should follow the line of the eyebrows.

big.description: Thick frames will help shift attention from a large nose. The absence of nosepads will play in favor.

long.description: Thick frames will help shift attention from a long nose. The absence of nosepads will play in favor.

small.description: Можно смело рассматривать модели с носоупорами. Полуобоковые и безободковые оправы стоят рассмотрения.

narrow.description: For a narrow cut of the eyes, it is better to choose large, not too thick frames. Dark shades are not the best choice.

brown.description: Suitable models has brown, blue, dark green, and light shades. Also consider the option of transparent plastic frames.

blue.description: Suitable models has blue, orange, and red shades. Also consider the option of transparent plastic frames.

gray.description: Any color will look great on you.

green.description: Bright, light colors will look great on you. Also consider the option of transparent plastic frames.

big.description: Thick rim frames will help you shift the accent from your forehead.

small.prefix: Small or is hidden behind the bangs
small.description: Consider examining not very thick frames.

big.description: Thick rim frames will help you shift the accent from your lips.

normal.description: Consider examining not very thick frames.

bald.prefix: There is a receding hairline or no hair
bald.description: Thick black frames with a flat top will suit you.

black.description: Metal frames with dark and shiny shades. Also consider the option of transparent plastic frames.

blonde.description: Gold, white and other bright colors will suit you.

grey.description: Metalic, black, brown and purple frames will suit you.

red.description: Gold, green, red, white, blue - these bright colors will suit you.

warm.description: Warm colors and frames with gold will suit you

cool.description: Cool colors and frames with silver will suit you.

black.description: A great idea would be to use contrast tones to your skin: light and transparent frames.

pale.description: A great idea would be to use contrast tones to your skin: black, brown models. Also consider the option of transparent plastic frames. Rimless frames are not the best choice. They will make you look older.

female.description: According to the research, women prefer fullrim plastic glasses.

male.description: According to the research, men prefer semirim or rimless metalic glasses.
